text: Sir Philip Lavallin Wroughton (19 April 1933 - 7 November 2020) is a British politician and businessman. He was born in Chaddleworth, Berkshire. He was the Lord Lieutenant of Berkshire from 1995 until 2008. He was Vice-Chairman of one of the World's largest insurance and investment management businesses, Marsh & McLennan Companies of New York City. Wroughton died on 7 November 2020, at the age of 87. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:British businesspeople Category:Lord-lieutenants Category:People from Berkshire
title: Philip Lavallin Wroughton
